entry.title: Seeking advice: Encouraging bug-fixing over new features
entry.summary: In a discussion thread, Rick Wesson suggests putting a bounty on the test framework to encourage more testing. He specifically recommends using the googletest framework, and provides a link to a list of C++ testing frameworks on Wikipedia. It is also mentioned that the boost testing framework is already implemented but lacks tests.
